name: Dave_Gotchi
description:
This is a joke game for a few of my friends and some old videos they used to make. This is my interpretation of a video series that my friends made, youtube link below:

They made quite a few of them, and it's been about 10 years since they made the first one so here is a game dedicated to them and their videos.

Game was created in GB studio, Enjoy.

Note: should be able to play on OpenEMU or KiGB
